ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I made a post to the contrary, but I was fighting HGs and using fear, so they were frequently beating on me.  It may be that the fact that I was
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I made a post to the contrary, but I was fighting HGs and using fear, so they were frequently
beating on me. It may be that the fact that I was getting bashed out of songs so often made me proc more
than would be normal with this bug.

I am also inerested if anyone else has seen the fear problems I described in another post.

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci.

"Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> If you were referring to the previous post by Naeeldar about procs still
> working as expected then it doesn't apply. He was referrring to procs with
> his necro and not his bard. I think every bard who has posted has noticed a
> decrease in procs after the patch.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
